import { Accordion, AccordionItem, AccordionItemButton, AccordionItemHeading, AccordionItemPanel, } from "react-accessible-accordion"; import './forecast.scss' const WEEK_DAYS = ['Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'] const Forecast = ({ data }) => { const dayInWeek = new Date().getDate(); const forecastDays = WEEK_DAYS.slice(dayInWeek, WEEK_DAYS.length).concat(WEEK_DAYS.slice(0,dayInWeek)) //array.prototype.concat(): merge two or more arrays return ( <> {data.list.splice(0, 7).map((item, idx) => (
//react bootstrap ))} ); }; export default Forecast;
